about_the_game:
WISHLIST AND FOLLOW US !


Typing Ninja is an exciting and educational game that combines the thrill of ninja training with the essential skill of typing. Dive into an immersive experience with the following key features:

Type the Falling Words: The core mechanic of the game, where you type rapidly to conquer waves of falling words.


Boss Fights: Engage in epic battles against unique bosses, each presenting distinct mechanics and varying levels of difficulty.


Customizable Keycaps: Unlock and collect cool keycaps that are added to your Steam inventory, allowing you to personalize your typing experience.


Create Your Own Levels: Design custom levels to practice specific words or create challenging stages for yourself and others. Share your creations and download levels made by other players.


Typing Ninja offers both an engaging storyline and endless typing challenges, making it perfect for improving your typing skills while having fun. Whether you're a typing novice or a seasoned pro, this game has something for everyone.

name: Typing Ninja Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher, macOS 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics, AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard onboard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher, macOS 10.15 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 7870, or equivalent)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or dedicated sound card with the latest drivers

short_description: Typing Ninja: A fast-paced typing game where you type falling words before they hit the ground. Play solo, team up in co-op, or challenge friends in PvP. Choose between Arcade and Story modes, use power-ups to gain an edge, and face off against challenging bosses.
